data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 2, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Santos will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Palmeiras.
In the minute 5, Lucas Lima (Palmeiras) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
In Santos, Matias Vina of Palmeiras is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Throw-in high up the field for Palmeiras in Santos.
Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 9, Santos drive forward but Marinho is judged offside.
Palmeiras have a dangerous throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 12, Palmeiras drives forward and Emerson Santos gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Santos at Urbano Caldeira.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santos.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Santos are coming forward and Felipe Jonatan gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 18, Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Throw-in for Santos in the half of Palmeiras.
In the minute 22, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Yeferson Soteldo is booked for the home team.
The match at Urbano Caldeira has been interrupted briefly for a check on Mayke, who is down injured.
In the minute 24, Santos drive upfield and Marinho gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Palmeiras defender.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Corner awarded to Santos.
In the minute 25, Can Santos capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Santos's Marinho misses with an attempt on goal.
Palmeiras have a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Throw-in Santos.
Mayke is back on his feet again.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 28, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Santos are pushing forward but Yeferson Soteldo's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Palmeiras at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 31, Santos's Marinho gets in a shot on goal at Urbano Caldeira. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a Santos throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
In the minute 32, Willian of Palmeiras gets in a strike, but is off target.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Santos a goal kick.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 35, Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Santos.
Santos to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
In the minute 38, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Diego Pituca.
Great play from Kaio Jorge to set up the goal.
Free kick Palmeiras.
In the minute 41, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards the home team a throw-in.
Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 43, Santos needs to be cautious. Palmeiras have an attacking throw-in.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In Santos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
The first-half has ended.
The second half has started at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 46, Marinho gets his shot on target but fails to score for Santos.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Corner awarded to Santos.
In the minute 49, In Santos, Lucas Verissimo (Santos) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
In the minute 54, Palmeiras have been awarded a penalty...
At Urbano Caldeira, Lucas Verissimo for the home team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
Raphael Veiga equalizes with a well-taken penalty.
In the minute 56, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Palmeiras have a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Santos in the half of Palmeiras.
Lucas Lima (Palmeiras) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
Santos are coming forward and Lucas Verissimo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
In the minute 60, Vinicius Lourenco is replacing Alison for the home team.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Santos.
In the minute 63, Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Goal! Willian gives Palmeiras a 1-2 lead in Santos.
Ze Rafael instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 66, Marinho for Santos gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santos.
In the minute 67, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Emerson Santos (Palmeiras) gets a yellow card.
The away team replace Willian with Gabriel Silva.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Santos.
In the minute 68, Santos are in shooting range from this free kick.
Santos's Marinho gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Palmeiras defender.
In the minute 69, Goal kick for Palmeiras at Urbano Caldeira.
The home team have replaced Lucas Braga with Bruno Marques. This is the second substitution made today by Cuca.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marinho is on target to level the scores at 2-2.
In the minute 71, That's a fine assist from Vinicius Lourenco.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
In the minute 73, Free kick Santos.
Palmeiras's Mayke has been booked in Santos.
Attention is being given to Santosâ€™s Felipe Jonatan and play has been suspended briefly.
Abel Ferreira (Palmeiras) is making a second substitution, with Breno Lopes replacing Lucas Lima.
In the minute 76, Santos's Felipe Jonatan is back in action after a slight knock.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a Santos throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 77, Santos's Para misses with an attempt on goal.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 78, Gabriel Veron of Palmeiras smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Corner awarded to Santos.
In the minute 80, In Santos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Mayke is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Mayke has recovered and rejoins the match in Santos.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In Santos Palmeiras drive forward through Raphael Veiga. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Santos close to the penalty box.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 86, At Urbano Caldeira, Diego Pituca has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Goal kick for Palmeiras at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 87, Flavio Rodrigues de Souza waits before resuming play because Alan Empereur for Palmeiras is still down.
Alan Empereur (Palmeiras) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Benjamin Kuscevic.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Throw-in Palmeiras.
7 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Flavio Rodrigues de Souza.
Can Santos capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Palmeiras's half?
Free kick for Santos in the half of Palmeiras.
Santos push forward at Urbano Caldeira and Para gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Palmeiras defence.
Lucas Verissimo for Santos is whistled offside.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza awards the home team a throw-in.
Yeferson Soteldo's header is off-target for Santos.
Palmeiras have a goal kick.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 9 minutes of added time.
Ball safe as Santos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Flavio Rodrigues de Souza signals a free kick to Santos.
That's full-time at Urbano Caldeira. The final score is 2-2.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Santos to check on Felipe Jonatan, who is grimacing with pain.
Palmeiras are down to 10 men after Ze Rafael has been shown a red card.
Cuca (Santos) has taken off Felipe Jonatan who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Laercio Solda is the replacement.
